pageContext.collection_description: Contains notes and scripts for the Metropolitan Opera Broadcasts, 1931-1975, scripts for The Chamber Music Society of Lower Basin Street, 1942-1944, WJZ 's Piano House, 1949-1950, General Motors Concerts, 1934-1936, and ABC's Festival, 1955-1957. Also includes handwritten stories for The Children's Hour plus correspondence, clippings and sound recordings.
